programme.title: Life at 50 Degrees
programme.desc: South Sudan is on the frontline of climate change. Extreme flooding has affected hundreds of thousands. Bentiu camp for displaced people is home to 35,000 people and has been surrounded by water for close to five years. Some of its residents have fled fighting, others escaped here after unprecedented floods began in 2019. At the worst point, two thirds of the state was under water. People are forced to forage for food like water lily roots to supplement UN rations. And the BBC has also been shown evidence that the floodwater may harbour another threat to the region's vulnerable inhabitants - pollution from the country's oil industry.

Richard investigates whether they can really make a difference.

programme.title: 100 Women
programme.desc: With a record 20 World Championship medals and 11 Olympic medals to her name, Allyson Felix is the most decorated track and field athlete in history. A dangerous pregnancy and the death of a close friend turned her into a fierce advocate for better maternal healthcare for black women. The retired athlete was behind the first nursery ever to open in an Olympic village, during the Paris 2024 games, and is now a member of the International Olympic Committee Athletes' Commission. BBC 100 Women sat down with Felix to talk about the challenges of combining motherhood and elite sport, and improving working conditions and safety for women athletes.

programme.title: East Is East
programme.desc: Pakistani chip shop owner George Khan tries to keep his seven unruly children under control in 1970s Salford. Revelling in the pleasures of adolescence, the flares-wearing youngsters seem determined to ignore his moral advice - but a shock is in store for two of his teenage sons when the shadow of arranged marriages threatens their freewheeling existence. Comedy drama, starring Om Puri, Linda Bassett, Jimi Mistry and Archie Panjabi

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Some of Britain's best-loved personalities turn their hand to being the country's most opinionated viewers in this look back over the standout moments from series six. Programmes under consideration include Bridgerton, MILF Manor, George Clarke's Amazing Spaces, In with a Shout, America's Sweethearts: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe, and coverage of the Glastonbury Festival and Donald Trump's victory in the 2024 US presidential election

programme.title: The Alternative Christmas Message
programme.desc: Fresh from lifting the Strictly Come Dancing winner's trophy, comedian Chris McCausland delivers this year's Alternative Christmas Message. As well as introducing viewers to his mince pie obsession, Chris calls for an end to discrimination against disabled people, pointing out that 50 per cent of disabled people of working age are without employment - double the national average

programme.title: The Piano
programme.desc: Claudia Winkleman, Mika and Lang Lang celebrate Christmas at Battersea Power Station in central London. They are joined by some of the stars of series two who perform seasonal favourites, including Walking in the Air, O Holy Night and River. Brad Kella, the winner of this year's series, returns with a show-stopping performance, while Mika and Lang Lang duet on a Beatles classic

programme.title: Kirstie's Fill Your House for Free
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp sources and creates furniture for Zoe and Gavin, who have had to deal with a recent redundancy in the family and want to turn their newly acquired Suffolk house into a home. Meanwhile, Gillian from Chorley in Lancashire hopes to transform her cramped bathroom into a nautical-themed sanctuary. Plus, a look at how author and designer Pearl Lowe has embraced the world of 'upcycling' in her Somerset property

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: In the Dordogne, at Chteau Domaine De La Barde, Tim and Krys spread festive joy by hosting a gingerbread chateau competition. In Normandy, there's no room at the inn for Auntie Paula at Chteau de Lalacelle, so in the spirt of Christmas, Terry and Ashley transform a stable block into her new home. Meanwhile, in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine at La Grande Maison La Pinelle, Bart and Sarah are going crackers as they want to hold a Christmas extravaganza for 60 guests in their barn. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A spoof of TV thriller Homeland in which Homer returns from a nuclear convention a changed man. Lisa's suspicions are aroused when she realises her dad has given up pork and beer and has developed a sudden fondness for power plant schematics, so she enlists the services of an unhinged FBI agent (voiced by Kristen Wiig, Bridesmaids) to get to the bottom of his behaviour

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Four Regrettings and a Funeral Season 25, Episode 3
programme.desc: The death of a popular Springfield man prompts four locals to address the biggest regrets of their lives so far. Homer still feels the sting of selling his Apple shares, wife Marge worries she may have been responsible for Bart's bad-boy instincts and newsreader Kent Brockman reveals he chickened out of a career move. As for the fourth - it seems even Mr Burns liked someone

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After watching Homer fall into a slump, Marge concocts a plan to make him feel alive again, getting in touch with his childhood pen-pal who help him live life to its fullest

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer helps to deliver a child in a lift, and the mother is so grateful she names her son after him, while Lisa tries to organise the Springfield Atoms cheerleaders to revolt against the team's greedy owner

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Kid Is All Right Season 25, Episode 6
programme.desc: Lisa is upset to discover her new friend is a Republican - and as if that wasn't bad enough, she is running against her in the campaign to be class representative. With the guest voice of Eva Longoria (Desperate Housewives)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: She of Little Faith Season 13, Episode 6
programme.desc: Mr Burns takes over the running of the local church and turns it into a profitable business, prompting a disgusted Lisa to leave the congregation in protest and become a Buddhist instead. Featuring the guest voice of Richard Gere

programme.title: Tad the Lost Explorer and the Secret of King Midas
programme.desc: Adventurer Tad Stones must rescue his beloved Sara from a millionaire who is looking for King Midas's necklace. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Trevor White and Alex Kelly

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: As the festive season approaches, the team at Woodgreen Pets Charity do some festive matchmaking. Twins Noah and Toby don't like sharing but luckily Jeff, a spaniel-cross puppy, loves to overshare as much as possible. Nurse Lynne is hoping to fill her empty home with a dog or two and 26-year-old Jazz is looking for a cuddly companion for her dad Darran in the shape of Patterdale-cross, Crackers

programme.title: Christmas at Lapland UK
programme.desc: Documentary delving behind the scenes at the Christmas tourist attraction, which creates a festive world of elves and reindeers deep in the woods of Royal Berkshire. The family run enterprise has expanded to employ Hollywood set builders and costume designers, and thousands of talented performers, to bring Father Christmas's home to life in the UK

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts
programme.desc: Jamie shares his best Betwixmas recipes, as he turns to that cosy period between Christmas and New Year, celebrating leftovers and transforming them into delicious dishes. From a vegetable tarte Tatin and a Brussel sprout Caesar salad to winter veg gnocchi and a way to turn that gifted panettone into a spectacular Black Forest gateau trifle

programme.title: A Very British Hotel
programme.sub-title: A Very British Hotel at Christmas
programme.desc: Cameras go behind the scenes at Brown's, London's oldest luxury hotel, during the Christmas season, as staff face the expectations of delivering a luxury festive stay for guests booking rooms that start at 750 a night. The hotel's elite team hosts a vibrant charity Christmas fayre, creates imaginative festive pastries, and concocts a signature holiday cocktail, all aimed at delivering the Christmas feast of a lifetime

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: The ragtag soldiers of the Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard are given the chance to prove their mettle by apprehending three German aviators who have parachuted into the country in the vanguard of a suspected Nazi invasion. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Arthur Lowe, John Le Mesurier, Clive Dunn, Bill Pertwee, Ian Lavender and Arnold Ridley

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: An upper-class soldier and his fellow officer stationed at Rorke's Drift in 1879 discover they have been cut off after the destruction of the main British army column in the area. They must rally their small force of 140 men against the might of 4,000 Zulu warriors advancing on their position. Fact-based historical drama, starring Michael Caine, Stanley Baker, Jack Hawkins, Ulla Jacobsson, Nigel Green and Chief Buthelezi, with narration by Richard Burton

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: News update. With sport and weather

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist, with his young sidekick and a nightclub singer in tow, is stranded in India, where he takes on a mission to recover magical sacred stones from the hands of an evil cult engaged in human sacrifice and child slavery. Steven Spielberg's action adventure, starring Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan and Amrish Puri

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down
programme.desc: Siobhan McSweeney hosts a festive special as Babatunde Aleshe, Martin Kemp, Rachel Riley and Tom Rosenthal take to the pottery studio to see who can make the best hand-built Winter Wonderland and throw the most festive wine coolers to impress judges Keith Brymer Jones and Rich Miller

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Regular Gogglebox critics including Giles and Mary, Pete and Sophie, Jenny and Lee, and the Siddiqui family hang up their Christmas stockings, for an extended edition of the TV review show providing a very merry look back at the best critiques of the current series

programme.title: Boxing Day
programme.desc: A British author living in America returns home to London for Christmas to introduce his American fiancee to his eccentric British-Caribbean family. However, their relationship is put to the test as she discovers the world her fiance has left behind. Comedy, starring Aml Ameen, Aja Naomi King and Leigh-Anne Pinnock

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frederick shows up sporting a shocking new look and ignores Frasier to spend time with a girl. Eddie becomes the centre of attention, and Martin unwittingly eats a marijuana-laced brownie. Kelsey Grammer and John Mahoney star

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits South Boulevard, a Korean-inspired restaurant in Little Rock, Arkansas. Owner Jermaine opened it a year before to serve a Korean menu in a tribute to his mother but is now $200,000 in debt and needs help turning things around

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tina Chiu from Mandarin Restaurants - an all-you-can-eat Chinese buffet chain - joins the lower ranks of her workforce to find out what the company could be doing to improve its position within Canada's competitive diner industry. She soon learns that serving drinks and preparing good food is easier said than done, before gathering employees at the company's headquarters to reveal her true identity

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon O'Brien brings the fairground to Liverpool in the form of a strength-testing machine, while Henry Cole restores a child's racing car from a sideshow

programme.title: Extraordinary Escapes with Sandi Toksvig
programme.sub-title: Extraordinary Escapes at Christmas with Sandi Toksvig Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: Businesswoman Deborah Meaden, actress Fay Ripley and space scientist Dr Maggie Aderin-Pocock accompany Sandi Toksvig as she travels to Norway. Maggie and Sandi go in search of killer whales during a stay in an architectural gem designed for guests to enjoy the wonders of the Northern Lights from their sofa, Deborah Meaden swaps the Dragons' Den for a face-to-face meeting with a pack of wolves and it really is cold feet for Fay Ripley when in sub-zero temperatures she and Sandi venture to a mountain-top glass cabin

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking at Christmas
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jamie Oliver gets creative and makes a pie that embraces whatever remains from the Christmas dinner. Melting down all the leftover bits and pieces from the cheeseboard, he creates the simplest retro fondue we can make in minutes. And smashing up the leftover mince pies and Christmas pudding, the chef rolls up a treat with his 'anything goes' strudel

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Principal Skinner introduces a unique incentive to stop pupils being naughty - a ride on a submarine. It seems to do the trick, and before long Springfield Elementary's finest are competing to be the best behaved - including Bart. But has the youngster committed too many crimes against Skinner to wipe the slate clean? Meanwhile, Lisa helps Krusty with his money troubles

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A radiation leak at the nuclear plant causes snow to fall, just in time for Christmas - and when Springfield is inundated with festive holiday-makers, Marge sees a chance to make some extra cash by opening up the family home to boarders. Meanwhile, Lisa decides it's the thought that counts when buying this year's gifts - much to the annoyance of Bart

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is fed up with the price of movies, so he starts illegally downloading films and opens his own cinema in the back yard. However, when Marge turns him in, he gets busted by a government anti-piracy squad, and finds himself in trouble with a host of Hollywood bigwigs, including writer and director Judd Apatow and actors Leslie Mann, Paul Rudd, Will Arnett and Channing Tatum

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Married to the Blob Season 25, Episode 10

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Specs and the City Season 25, Episode 11
programme.desc: Mr Burns buys his employees hi-tech specs so he can spy on them. Homer is completely dazzled by his new eyewear - until they lead him to make an unexpected discovery about Marge. Meanwhile, Bart stages a rebellion against school bully Nelson

programme.title: Frasier

programme.title: Oliver!

Featuring the iconic songs Food, Glorious Food, Consider Yourself, As Long as He Needs Me and You've Got to Pick a Pocket or Two. Starring Ron Moody, Mark Lester, Oliver Reed, Jack Wild, Harry Secombe, Shani Wallis and Leonard Rossiter

The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones

They must embark on a death-defying journey through the game's wilderness setting to make it back to the real world, or be stuck as video game characters forever. Fantasy action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Karen Gillan, Kevin Hart and Jack Black

Joseph Strauss was the arrogant showman promoting the project, while Charles Ellis and Leon Moisseiff were the mathematical geniuses behind the Golden Gate's cutting-edge design. Since its completion in 1937, it has received a staggering 10 million tourists every year

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Two hitmen are ordered to lie low in Belgium after an assignment goes tragically wrong. Trying to pass themselves off as ordinary tourists in the medieval city of Bruges, the bickering duo get caught up in a string of surreal misadventures - and then they learn the real and sinister reason why their unstable boss sent them there in the first place. Comedy drama, starring Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson, Ralph Fiennes and Clemence Poesy

programme.title: Mrs Doubtfire
programme.desc: A struggling actor's ambitious, no-nonsense wife throws him out and demands a divorce. Desperate to spend time with his children, he puts his talents to good use by donning drag and posing as a British housekeeper to get a job looking after them - unaware of the positive impact the character will have on his life and career. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Sally Field, Pierce Brosnan, Harvey Fierstein and Mara Wilson

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: A minor-league ice hockey player is nicknamed the Tooth Fairy for knocking opponents' teeth out on the ice. When the cynical athlete discourages a young fan, he is forced to pay penance by spending a week as the real Tooth Fairy, rediscovering his dreams in the process. Family comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Stephen Merchant, Ryan Sheckler and Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: We Live in Time Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Andrew Garfield and Florence Pugh - along with director John Crowley - talk about making the Film4-backed romantic drama We Live in Time

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The heroic autobots discover that a spaceship from their own planet crashed into the moon decades ago, carrying their former leader and an incredibly powerful device. They must fight to defend the human race as their enemies the decepticons plot to use this machine to rebuild their own world and destroy the Earth. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Shia LaBeouf, Josh Duhamel and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Honest Thief
programme.desc: A bank robber falls in love, and decides the time has come to bring his life of crime to an end. He turns himself in to the FBI, only to be double-crossed by two crooked agents. Crime thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Kate Walsh and Jai Courtney

programme.title: A Quiet Place Part II
programme.desc: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now faces the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realise the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path. Horror sequel, directed by and starring John Krasinski, with Emily Blunt, Millicent Simmonds and Cillian Murphy

programme.title: The Long Good Friday
programme.desc: A ruthless London crime lord tries to extend his dockland empire by exploring business opportunities in America. When his organisation is the target of a series of bombings, he discovers a mysterious syndicate is trying to muscle in on his territory, and resorts to increasingly brutal methods to expose the culprits. Gritty thriller, starring Bob Hoskins, Helen Mirren, Dave King and Bryan Marshall, with Pierce Brosnan and Casualty's Derek Thompson in supporting roles

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A rich high-school student uses all her charm and financial clout to boost an awkward new pupil's image, but soon finds she has created a monster - while her own popularity suffers in the process. Comedy inspired by Jane Austen's Emma, starring Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: A heartless TV executive is cruel to his employees and sees the festive season as nothing more than an opportunity to make money. However, on Christmas Eve, three ghosts arrive in the night and challenge him to change his cynical ways by showing him his past, present and future. Comedy based on Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol, starring Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, David Johansen and Carol Kane

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: A wealthy woman's privileged existence is shattered when she discovers her husband is having an affair with her best friend. Seeking solace, she turns to her estranged sister, who lives in a London council estate, and finds a new lease of life in joining her community dance class. Comedy, starring Imelda Staunton, Celia Imrie, Timothy Spall and Joanna Lumley

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: The seemingly invincible hero returns, this time with a $14million bounty on his head which rises each hour, and every underworld figure around the world desperate to cash in. However, John Wick does receive support from Sofia, a fellow dog lover, assassin and manager of Casablanca's Continental Hotel. Director Chad Stahelski's action thriller sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Halle Berry and Ian McShane

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An underworld courier lives by a simple code - to never ask what he is transporting. However, when he discovers his latest cargo is alive, his conscience gets the better of him and he faces a dangerous game of cat and mouse with his unknown but powerful employers. Action adventure, starring Jason Statham, Shu Qi, Matt Schulze and Francois Berleand

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: A 17th-century sorcerer escapes execution by travelling forward in time to the 1980s, where he searches for a mystical book that will allow him to bring about the end of the world. However, a heroic witch hunter has pursued him through time intent on bringing his evil schemes to an end. Fantasy adventure, starring Julian Sands, Richard E Grant, Lori Singer and Kevin O'Brien

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Mr Popper's Penguins
programme.desc: A workaholic businessman always puts his job before his family until he receives an unexpected inheritance from his explorer father - six penguins. He abandons his plan to offload the birds to a zoo when he finds his kids love them, and sets about turning his New York apartment into a suitable habitat. Family comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Carla Gugino and Angela Lansbury

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: In 1987, lonely Californian teenager Charlie Watson is traumatised by the death of her father and resentful of her mother Sally's relationship with new boyfriend Ronald. For her 18th-birthday she's given a yellow Volkswagen Beetle, which turns out to be the battle-scarred Autobot Bumblebee. Transformers prequel, starring Hailee Steinfeld, John Cena and Jorge Lendeborg Jr

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Robert McCall divides his time between cab driving and looking after a young man who is mixing with a bad crowd. When a CIA friend is murdered, the former black ops agent sets out to avenge her death, and winds up fighting for survival in his hurricane-battered home town. Action thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Pedro Pascal and Ashton Sanders

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter goes on a quest to save Quahog's annual Christmas carnival from cancellation, which involves transforming his father in-law from a scrooge to a home-town hero. Meanwhile, Stewie devises a plan to make sure he receives his chosen gift

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Stan goes to great lengths to reclaim his title as the self-proclaimed King of Presents when Steve outclasses him at Christmas

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Stan's plans to change Steve's attitude go awry when he lets out a demon who punishes naughty children at Christmas, and it kidnaps his son. Meanwhile, Hayley gets a job at the airport - but soon realises she may not be suited to customer services

programme.title: Shopping with Keith Lemon
programme.sub-title: Olly Murs and Motsi Mabuse Season 4, Episode 3
programme.desc: Keith chats to Olly Murs as the singer goes looking for a new fridge, then joins Strictly Come Dancing judge Motsi Mabuse while out shopping for handbags in Knightsbridge

programme.title: Shopping with Keith Lemon
programme.sub-title: Josie Gibson and Melvin Odoom Season 4, Episode 4

programme.desc: Routines by Russell Kane, Seann Walsh, Dane Baptiste, Glenn Moore, Lily Phillips, Nabil Abdul Rashid, Bella Hull and Vidura Rajapaksa are brought to life in sketch form

programme.title: Deep Fake Neighbour Wars
programme.sub-title: Deep Fake Neighbour Wars - Best Bust Ups Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: A special compilation episode of Deep Fake Neighbour Wars - the show that uses Deep Fake technology to turn the UK's best new impressionists into the world's most famous celebrities - only here they are ordinary people who happen to be embroiled in petty neighbour disputes. In this episode, Andy Murray and his mum, Lorraine Kelly, clash with RuPaul over noisy chickens, Idris Elba gets a shock when new neighbour Kim Kardashian starts making her presence known in their communal garden, and Greta Thunberg is upset by Conor McGregor and Ariane Grande's perennial Christmas decorations

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmondson narrates a selection of unusual records, including the world's smallest horse, the world's fastest human crab, and the highest note ever sung

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: A selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts, including the most slam dunks by a parrot and the fastest time to put on and take off underwear. Matt Edmondson narrates

programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

When Abdulla then has a chance encounter with a shadowy figure at the bus stop on his way home, a disappointing night ends with a supernatural twist...

Whodunit, guest-starring Sarah Miles (Ryan's Daughter), with David Suchet, Lysette Anthony and Edward Fox

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are called away from a team-building exercise to investigate a fatal explosion at a haulage yard in Calham Cross. The property is owned by Territorial Army commanding officer Matt Parkes, the father of a businessman whose ruthlessness in the boardroom is matched only by his behaviour toward women. To complicate matters, the village is also home to a peace protester and a grieving mother - and Barnaby has to decide if any of these locals is capable of arson and murder. John Nettles and Jason Hughes star, with Tim Pigott-Smith, Joseph Millson, Niamh Cusack, Judy Parfitt and Nick Fletcher

programme.title: Goodbye Mr Chips
programme.desc: Martin Clunes stars as an earnest Latin master working at the Brookfield School of the 1880s, where he meets and marries his true love Kathie and finds himself touched by politics, grief and the utter devastation of World War One. Charting more than 50 years of one man's extraordinary life, the story ends in the 1930s, as a wise, elderly and much-loved Mr Chipping lives out his last days in retirement. Frank Delaney's adaptation of James Hilton's timeless classic, which has never been out of print since first appearing as a magazine serialisation in 1934, and for which Robert Donat whipped an Oscar from under the nose of Gone with the Wind's Clark Gable in the 1939 film production. Also starring Victoria Hamilton, Conleth Hill and Patrick Malahide

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Movie to be announced.

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: London orphan Molly Moon (Raffey Cassidy) must outwit a crook who wants to get his hands on her hypnotism book.

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: A boy (Josh Hutcherson) and his new friend (AnnaSophia Robb), the class outsider, create an imaginary world in which they rule as king and queen.

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.

programme.title: Witchville
programme.desc: Prince Malachy (Luke Goss) returns home from the Crusades and finds the kingdom haunted by a dark force after his father's death.

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: Exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules (Kellan Lutz) must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.

programme.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
programme.desc: In the 28th century, two special operatives (Dane DeHaan, Cara Delevingne) race against time to save the diverse city of Alpha from a dark force that also jeopardizes the future of the universe.

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: During a routine investigation involving robot manipulation, an insurance agent (Antonio Banderas) at a robotics company makes a discovery that has profound consequences for the human race.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: John Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) calls upon his long-buried but lethal skills to rescue a missionary (Julie Benz) and her comrades from the Burmese army.

programme.title: Rambo: Last Blood
programme.desc: War veteran John Rambo tries to find some semblance of peace by raising horses on a ranch in Arizona. But when a vicious Mexican cartel kidnaps a teenage girl, Rambo embarks on a bloody and personal quest to rescue her and punish those responsible.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: An expert (Sylvester Stallone) in prison security joins forces with an inmate (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to break out of a top-secret, high-tech facility.

programme.title: Bait Shop
programme.desc: The owner (Bill Engvall) of a small-town bait shop competes in a fishing tournament for the prize money to save his business.

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: An Army officer mistakes three buddies (Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall, D.J. Qualls) for Army Reservists and deploys them to Iraq, but their vehicle is prematurely ejected over Mexico.

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: A CIA operative (Jackie Chan) must protect his girlfriend's children from a Russian terrorist after one kid mistakenly downloads a top-secret formula.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: Retired CIA agents (Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich) reassemble for survival after the agency sends assassins to silence them and the secrets they carry.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA black-ops agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) and his team battle assassins, terrorists and power-hungry government officials as they try to retrieve a lethal device that could change the balance of world power.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent (Mark Ruffalo) and an Interpol detective (Mlanie Laurent) play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.
